no-win.translation[0].definitions[0].def: relating to a situation in which whatever you choose to do it will have a bad result
no-win.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: If my child is sick and I leave work, I’m a bad employee. If I don’t, I’m a bad mother. It’s a no-win situation.
no-win.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a situation etc which will end badly whatever people decide to do
no-win.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The decision could put companies in a no-win situation.
He undertook what many regarded as a no-win task: streamlining the company’s data processing.
